meaningMnemonic: The <kanji>evidence</kanji> is <kanji>based on</kanji> something. What is it based on? This <vocabulary>physical evidence</vocabulary>. Ha ha! Guilty!
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You just need to remember that 拠 is using the こ reading you learned, not the きょ one. Just remember that you can never trust the word of a 子 (こ), so you always require them to provide <vocabulary>physical evidence</vocabulary>.
